CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(amc__Billing_Type__c, "Fixed Price"), amc__Hours_Completed_Value_Cost__c + amc__Hours_Remaining_Value_Cost__c + amc__Material_Costs_Forecast__c + IF(amc__Anticipated_Project_Expenses__c > amc__Actual_Project_Expenses__c, amc__Anticipated_Project_Expenses__c, amc__Actual_Project_Expenses__c),amc__Hours_Completed_Value_Cost__c + amc__Hours_Remaining_Value_Cost__c + amc__Material_Costs_Forecast__c + amc__Actual_Project_Expenses_Non_Billable__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Provides a cost summary using Hours Completed Value (Cost) + Hours Remaining Value (Cost) + Material Costs Forecast + the greater value between Anticipated and Actual Expenses
CustomField.label: Total Project Cost (Forecast)
